p.span: elcome to the North Mercer School District's website. This site is provided to help answer questions and disseminate information to the public to provide a better understanding of the happenings at North Mercer. In addition, we hope the information provided will contribute to a collaborative relationship between the school and community and to help uphold the North Mercer R-III School mission: to inspire life-long learning.
